products.title: Pale Pink &Amp;amp; White (4565 &Amp;amp; 1016)
products.description: The velux duo blackout blind is a blackout blind and a pleated blind in one. It offers the best of both worlds, blackout at anytime and softly diffused natural light all day. It is available in all blackout blind colours in combination with a white pleated blind. Blackout at anytime. Oeko-tex certified. Softly diffuses incoming daylight. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.

products.title: Podium Midnight (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm composition: polyester guarantee: 12 months stack: a choice of left, right or split. Controls: wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across. Headrail: robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required. Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets. Buy made to measure podium midnight (blackout) blackout panel blinds from soeasy blinds.
